measured_by: 0-100 slider estimate of trustee choosing reciprocity
justification: "…they were asked to state their expectations of reciprocity. Specifically, we asked: How likely is it that Player 2 will choose RIGHT [reciprocation]? They could drag a slider along a scale ranging from 0 … to 100 …"
"…indicated their confidence in having made the right decisions by dragging a slider along a scale ranging from 0 (not at all confident) to 100 (extremely confident)."

measured_by: Binary IN vs. OUT choice in the trust game
justification: "Participants … played a trust game where participants could … make a single decision between IN and OUT (trust and status quo)… Participants made their one-shot trust decision."
